name: A Walk in the Park (Dr. B.A. Ferguson, insomnaleptic, fstreat02, NykiaO)
name_original: A Walk in the Park (Dr. B.A. Ferguson, insomnaleptic, fstreat02, NykiaO)
description:
We made this game for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. The composer Nykia and I (Dr. B.A. Ferguson) came up with the premise, and the game was made with VNMaker (and its assets). The backgrounds were from Neeka of OBP (https://itch.io/profile/neeka-of-obp). A Walk in the Park follows Rosa as they meet their childhood friend Dario in the park. They have not seen each other in a long time, and something seems off... The game has three endings in all: a "good" ending, a "neutral" ending, and a "bad" ending. See if you can get all three!

Design by Dr. B.A. Ferguson (@Ferguson_music)

Music by Nykia Osborne (@NykiaO)

Rosa's Voice by insomnaleptic (@insomnaleptic)

Dario's Voice by Favian Streat (@fstreat02)
